nodes.text: Nosaurian was the language spoken by the Nosaurians of New Plympto.
The Nosaurian language consisted of barks, warbles and hissing sibilants.
Written Nosaurian combined two different alphabets from ancient times. The written form also included metaphors about nature, weather and seasonal cycles, which do not appear in the spoken form.
Notable non-native speakers of Nosaurian language
